readable.title: 325576658_59f68bdbd6
readable.content: A man is sitting on a blue bench with a blue blanket covering his face . A man sits on a blue city bench with a blue blanket over his head . A person on a blue bench under a blue blanket . A person with a blue blanket on his head sits on a metal bench in an urban neighborhood . The man sitting on the blue bench has a blanket covering his head .
